title: Why is it so difficult to find chords to Ukulele Ike songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: I had to google Ukelele Ike because I didn’t know who that was - and then realized I had heard him before but didn’t know his name. I would say that I have a reasonable general knowledge of music and musicians so I would file him in the ‘slightly obscure’ category. It takes a certain kind of fan with the time to, desire to, and sufficient skill to chart out the chords to songs, and I would guess because he is partially obscure there isn’t really anybody interested enough to do that…and if there is they may not be posting them to the internet for several different reasons (just for personal use, they think no one else is interested, etc)
